## Read shp file

## Handling data
```{r}
cleaned_gender_data <- gender_data %>%
  select(country, iso3, gii_2019, gii_2010) %>%
  mutate(difference = gii_2019 - gii_2010) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  left_join(.,World_Countries, by=c("country" = "COUNTRY"))

head(cleaned_gender_data)
```
